se.fredin.gravitation.entity.handler

Class StationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.fredin.gravitation.entity.handler.StationHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class StationHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Handler class for all the stations in the game. Responsible for drawing them and updating them.
    Author:
    Johan Fredin

    • Constructor Detail

      • StationHandler

        public StationHandler(com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap map,
              Player player,
              float unitScale)
        Creates the stations.
        Parameters:
        map - The TiledMap object to give the stations to.
        player - The player to interact with the stations.
        unitScale - The unit scale of the map.

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick(float delta)
        Updates the stations. Lights up the next station once the player has passed one.
        Parameters:
        delta - The time interval since last render occurred.

      • render

        public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
        Draws the stations to the screen.
        Parameters:
        batch - The SpriteBatch responsible for drawing to the screen.

      • isLastStationPassed

        public boolean isLastStationPassed()
        Check if the last station has been passed.
        Returns:
        true if the last station has been passed.
